TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventEntry extends System.Object

summary.span: 作为事件处理程序的属性项。

span.span: Acts as the property entry for event handlers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页分析器在分析过程中使用属性项类来表示在服务器控件标记中找到的表达式。The page parser uses property entry classes during parsing to represent expressions found within server control tags. 类用于绑定到指定事件处理程序的属性的表达式。The class is used for expressions that are bound to properties that specify an event handler. 这些绑定属性以 "on" 开头，例如 `OnClick` 或 `OnInit` 。These bound properties start with "on", such as `OnClick` or `OnInit`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在属性设置中， 属性设置为表达式的值。In the property setting, the property is set to the value of the expression.
